body_html:
Agreed, conditionals returning different possible shapes is desirable. That's what I was trying to do.

But surely a placeholder of shape [1,5] should not accept a tensor of shape [12,15], inside a conditional or no.

body:
Agreed, conditionals returning different possible shapes is desirable.  That's what I was trying to do. 

But surely a placeholder of shape [1,5] should not accept a tensor of shape [12,15], inside a conditional or no.
